button.Name: Close

Textentry.name: Pickup
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your pickup bookmark. The bookmark can be a station if you are picking up from a personal hangar or corporate hangar, or a location if you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure. If you are picking up from an Fleet Hangar or Jetcan, the bookmark needs to be any bookmark in the system where your fleet is mining."]

listbox.Name: PickupList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your pickup bookmark. The bookmark can be a station if you are picking up from a personal hangar or corporate hangar, or a location if you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure. If you are picking up from an Fleet Hangar or Jetcan, the bookmark needs to be any bookmark in the system where your fleet is mining."]

CheckBox.name: FlybyPickups
CheckBox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["If this is toggled on, ComBot will wait until the fleet hangar has enough to fill your threshold before going to pick up. If it is deselected, ComBot will always immediately fly to your pickup pilot and remain there until your threshold is reached."]

TextEntry.name: PickupContainer
TextEntry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to supply ComBot with an identifier for your pickup location. If you are picking up from an Fleet Hangar, this needs to contain the name of the pilot flying your Fleet Hangar. If you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure, this needs to contain the structure's name. This field is also used to specify the prefix for corporate bookmarks created using the Corporate Jetcan mode."]

Text.name: PickupSubTypeTitle
Text.OnLoad: switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.PickupType} { case Jetcan break case Corporation Folder This:SetText[Corporation Folder] break case Container This:SetText[Corporation Folder] break default This:Hide }

listbox.Name: PickupSubType
listbox.OnLoad: switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.PickupType} { case Jetcan This:AddItem[Fleet Jetcan] This:AddItem[Fleet Jetcan(Pop All)] break case Corporation Hangar This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break case Container This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break default This:Hide } This.ItemByText[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.PickupSubType}]:Select
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to further configure your pickup type for types that have additional options, like Jetcans."]

TextEntry.name: DropoffContainer
TextEntry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to supply ComBot with an identifier for your dropoff location. If you are delivering to a Player Owned Station structure, this needs to contain the structure's name."]

Textentry.name: Dropoff
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your dropoff location bookmark. If you are delivering to a personal or corporate hangar in a station, the bookmark needs to be a station. If you are delivering to a POS structure, the bookmark should be near the structure."]

listbox.Name: DropoffList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your dropoff location bookmark. If you are delivering to a personal or corporate hangar in a station, the bookmark needs to be a station. If you are delivering to a POS structure, the bookmark should be near the structure."]

listbox.Name: DropoffSubType
listbox.OnLoad: switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.DropoffType} { case Corporation Hangar This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break case Container This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break } This.ItemByText["${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.DropoffSubType}"]:Select
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to further configure your dropoff type for types that have additional options, like Corporate Hangars."]

listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field determines how ComBot should drop off cargo after it reaches the dropoff location."]

Slider.name: Threshold
Slider.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to determine when ComBot should perform a dropoff."]

listbox.Name: Queue
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field displays the cargo operations you have queued."]

Button.name: Add
Button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["Add a haul operation based on the action tab currently selected below."]

Button.name: Remove
Button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["Remove the selected action from the queue to the right."]

Checkbox.name: Repeat
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["When this is checked, ComBot will repeat the haul queue continuously."]

Textentry.name: Pickup
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your pickup bookmark. The bookmark can be a station if you are picking up from a personal hangar or corporate hangar, or a location if you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure. If you are picking up from an Fleet Hangar or Jetcan, the bookmark needs to be any bookmark in the system where your fleet is mining."]

listbox.Name: PickupList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your pickup bookmark. The bookmark can be a station if you are picking up from a personal hangar or corporate hangar, or a location if you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure. If you are picking up from an Fleet Hangar or Jetcan, the bookmark needs to be any bookmark in the system where your fleet is mining."]

TextEntry.name: PickupContainer
TextEntry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to supply ComBot with an identifier for your pickup location. If you are picking up from an Fleet Hangar, this needs to contain the name of the pilot flying your Fleet Hangar. If you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure, this needs to contain the structure's name. This field is also used to specify the prefix for corporate bookmarks created using the Corporate Jetcan mode."]

Text.name: PickupSubTypeTitle
Text.OnLoad: switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.PickupType} { case Jetcan break case Corporation Folder This:SetText[Corporation Folder] break case Container This:SetText[Corporation Folder] break default This:Hide }

listbox.Name: PickupSubType
listbox.OnLoad: switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.PickupType} { case Jetcan This:AddItem[Fleet Jetcan] This:AddItem[Fleet Jetcan(Pop All)] break case Corporation Hangar This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break case Container This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break default This:Hide } This.ItemByText[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.PickupSubType}]:Select
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to further configure your pickup type for types that have additional options, like Jetcans."]

listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field determines how ComBot should pick up cargo for hauling."]

TextEntry.name: DropoffContainer
TextEntry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to supply ComBot with an identifier for your dropoff location. If you are delivering to a Player Owned Station structure, this needs to contain the structure's name."]

Textentry.name: Dropoff
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your dropoff location bookmark. If you are delivering to a personal or corporate hangar in a station, the bookmark needs to be a station. If you are delivering to a POS structure, the bookmark should be near the structure."]

listbox.Name: DropoffList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your dropoff location bookmark. If you are delivering to a personal or corporate hangar in a station, the bookmark needs to be a station. If you are delivering to a POS structure, the bookmark should be near the structure."]

listbox.Name: DropoffSubType
listbox.OnLoad: switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.DropoffType} { case Corporation Hangar This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break case Container This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break } This.ItemByText["${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Hauler.Config.DropoffSubType}"]:Select
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field is used to further configure your dropoff type for types that have additional options, like Corporate Hangars."]

listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field determines how ComBot should drop off cargo after it reaches the dropoff location."]

Textentry.name: Move
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your move location bookmark."]

listbox.Name: MoveList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Hauler_Frame@ComBot_Hauler]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your dropoff location bookmark. If you are delivering to a personal or corporate hangar in a station, the bookmark needs to be a station. If you are delivering to a POS structure, the bookmark should be near the structure."]
